overview:
Warren Knight is a B2B Social Media and Social Commerce Expert and specialises in helping SME’s use Social Media Marketing to better understand their customer. With nearly 20 years experience in selling B2B and the founder of UK 1st “Social Sharing” eCommerce platform Gloople. Warren’s entrepreneurial skills started in the music industry at the early age of 19. After receiving a grant from the Princess Youth Business Trust by the age of 22, he started his own music and clothing European Distribution Company. Focusing on business growth Warren became the director of a global stationary and accessory business working with Disney, and for the last 4 years has specialised in helping companies sell products and services, through Social Media Marketing

Warren has worked with the global brands Disney and Nickelodeon, growing a licensee from $5Million to $30Million selling to over 40 countries in a 5-year period achieving $1 Million sales in 1 month, and is now the co-founder of the UK’s 1st Social Sharing e-commerce platform Gloople
